text: Kasibugga is a town of Palasa in Srikakulam district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is a municipality and the part in mandal of Palasa . == Geography == Kasibugga is located at 18° 45' 33N 84° 24' 58E. It has an average elevation of 38 meters (127 feet). ==Politics== Kasibugga is comes under Palasa (Assembly constituency) and the urban local body is ruled by Palasa-Kasibugga Municipality. == Transport == Kasibugga is well connected with major cities in Visakhapatnam region and other cities and towns in Telangana and Odisha. National Highway 16(formerly NH5)] alongside the town. of and nearest railway station is Palasa railway station. == References == == External links == Category:Cities and towns in Srikakulam district
title: Kasibugga
